item.dc:creator: @Reefwalker Reefwalker
item.description:
@Reefwalker wrote:

Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.20\includes\SSI2.txt does not exist.
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.20\includes\boxbreaker.txt does not exist.
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.20\includes\RedXIIsFordCracker.txt does not exist.

WTF I HAVE AN ERROR AND CANT COMPILE> I WANT TO CHEAT ALREADY!!! HELP!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 15, 2008, 02:01:27 am[/size][hr]when I Go to download includes, all I have to overwrite is a SH.Scar file???

item.dc:creator: @WileyCoyote WileyCoyote
item.description:
@WileyCoyote wrote:

please no flame. okay ive downloaded the script loaded it in Scar 2.03 and i picked ore color and told it to mine or hit go

1.) it goes to the runescape screen doesnt do anything.
2.) if i quickly click the RuneScape window still nothing happens.

So what am i doing wrong? I keep getting this also…

Color Picked: 1779268 at (288, 238)
Successfully compiled
Font has been loaded from C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Charsrs2\

ERROR! cannot find pick in screen, please put pick in inventory or your equip page and restart the script!

Pick head colors… 0 0 0 0 0
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////
\ //
\ //
\Unable to find the rock color,we may have got lost//
\ //
\ PLEASE RESTART THE SCRIPT //
\ //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Successfully executed

and the script ends.

hey,

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
[RS2] Autominer F.A.Q
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

How do i get the following files?
SSi2.txt
boxbreaker.txt
include RedXIIsFordCracker.txt
Reply With Quote

open scar and go to file/download includes/then overight them all
